#summary Links to !BitTorrent download pages for OWASPBWA VM.

= Introduction =

In addition to the !SourceForge downloads page for the OWASPBWA VM at http://sourceforge.net/projects/owaspbwa/files/, the VM is also available via !BitTorrent using [http://burnbit.com BurnBit].

Use one of the links below to download the current VM using !BitTorrent.  The VM is available in three formats, all of which contain the same VM:

  * 7-zip: Virtual Disk and VMware Virtual Machine files, compressed using [7-zip http://www.7-zip.org/‎].  Smallest download, but requires [7-zip http://www.7-zip.org/‎] to decompress.
  * Zip: Virtual Disk and VMware Virtual Machine files, compressed using Zip. Most operating systems include tools to decompress Zip files.
  * OVA: Virtual Machine in [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Virtualization_Format Open Virtualization Format].  Downloading this format may make use of the VM in tools other than VMware products a bit easier.
